title: Lesson 7: Simple Sentences
description: Simple Sentences with any subject and object

sentences.english: This wickiup is going to sing.
These have smelled us, you and I.
That mountain is going to visit you.
Rice has been eaten by you.
The rock will see the bird snake.
That bird snake is going to walk.
That worm is going to read.
The weasel is eating the rice.
That river is going to sleep.
The dog has found the cup.
That lizard is going to laugh.
The bird snake is writing the cup.
That squirrel is going to lie down.
That water is going to talk to this worm.
That coyote is going to write.
That coffee is going to cook you all.
The apple has chased the birds.
You and I are going to laugh.
The dog is going to chirp.
The earth is going to walk.
Food is going to climb us.
That wickiup is cooking for us.
The earth is cooking this bird.
You and I read the weasel.
That mountain is going to sing.
The cat will read the rock.
